text: Babandi bumviye Nyagasani wabo bazagororerwa ibyiza (Ijuru). Naho babandi batamwumviye, iyo baza kugira ibyo mu isi byose hiyongereyeho nâ€™ibindi nkabyo, bari kubyicunguza (kugira ngo barokoke ibihano, ariko ntibigire icyo bibamarira). Abo bazagira ibarura ribi ndetse ubuturo bwabo ni umuriro wa Jahanamu; kandi ubwo ni bwo buturo bubi
